events.title: Debut with Square One
events.description: BLACKPINK debuted with their single album Square One, featuring 'Whistle' and 'Boombayah'.

events.title: Coachella 2019 Performance
events.description: First K-pop girl group to perform at Coachella, with shows on April 12 and 19.

events.title: The Show Livestream Concert
events.description: First livestream concert in collaboration with YouTube Music, rescheduled from December 27, 2020, due to COVID-19 regulations.

events.title: Born Pink World Tour Start
events.description: Tour began in Seoul, becoming the highest-grossing tour by a Korean girl group at the time.

events.title: Coachella 2023 Headline
events.description: First Asian act to headline Coachella.

events.title: 2025 World Tour - Inglewood
events.description: BLACKPINK 2025 World Tour at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, CA, with shows on July 12 and 13.

events.title: 2025 World Tour - St Denis
events.description: BLACKPINK 2025 World Tour at Stade de France in St Denis, France, with shows on August 2 and 3.

songs.title: Whistle
songs.achievements: Topped the Gaon Digital Chart, sold over 2.5 million digital copies in South Korea.

songs.title: Boombayah
songs.achievements: #1 on Billboard World Digital Song Sales chart.

songs.title: Ddu-Du Ddu-Du
songs.achievements: Peaked at #55 on Billboard Hot 100, certified gold in the US.

songs.title: How You Like That
songs.achievements: Peaked at #33 on Billboard Hot 100, topped the Gaon Digital Chart.

songs.title: Ice Cream (with Selena Gomez)
songs.achievements: Peaked at #13 on Billboard Hot 100, longest-charting song by a female Korean act.

songs.title: Pink Venom
songs.achievements: #1 on Billboard Global 200 for two weeks, #2 on Circle Digital Chart.

songs.title: Shut Down
songs.achievements: #1 on Billboard Global 200, #3 on Circle Digital Chart.

songs.title: The Girls
songs.achievements: Physical version topped the Circle Album Chart.

songs.title: Kill This Love
songs.achievements: Peaked at #41 on Billboard Hot 100, certified platinum in the US.
